dialogue.text: Look at these shelvesâ€”every 'What am I?' ever asked is preserved here. Not the answers, but the questions themselves, each one adding to the archive of wondering.
So many... and mine is here too? Every time I've asked it?
dialogue.visual_cue: finding his own questions among countless others

dialogue.text: Every iteration, every variation. See how your question has evolved? The first time you asked was different from now. The question remembers its own journey.
dialogue.visual_cue: questions changing color and form over time

dialogue.text: They're all connected... like a root system. Each new asking grows from the previous ones.
The question 'What am I?' has the longest memory of all. It remembers every consciousness that ever wondered, and through you, it wonders again, enriched by all who came before.
dialogue.visual_cue: ancient questions glowing through new ones
